channel.title: As2 on On Code & Design
channel.description: Recent content in As2 on On Code & Design

item.title: A Primer to AS2
item.description: This post was reproduced on PortX’s blog. AS2 has been out for a while but I bet most of you have never heard of the spec. Indeed, a couple of months ago I myself was oblivious to it. That is until ModusBox asked me to help them build a first-class AS2 connector for Mule. AS2 (Applicability Statement 2) is a protocol that operates over HTTP/s and is typically used between organisations to exchange business data in any format securely.
